ai.summary: Carn Brea FP 14 is a short, easy 0.9 km hike in the UK. This quick outing is suitable for most ages and abilities, offering a gentle walk on well-defined paths with minimal elevation gain.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows mostly even, well-defined paths with occasional uneven ground, loose gravel, and small steps. Overall minimal elevation change, making it accessible for beginners.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather before you go; UK conditions can change rapidly. Stay on marked paths; uneven surfaces can be slippery when wet. Bring a layer and water, and supervise children or dogs. Respect local guidelines and practice Leave No Trace.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing suitable for variable UK weather
Phone with map or GPS and basic first-aid kit
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with the best conditions typically in spring and autumn; summers are generally mild, and winters can be chilly and wet.

seo.title: Carn Brea FP 14 – Easy 0.9 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Carn Brea FP 14, a short and easy 0.9 km hike in the UK. Perfect for a quick outdoor escape with minimal effort and all-ability accessibility.
